problem_text:
Is an abelian minimal normal subgroup A of a group G an elementary p-group if the factor-group G/A is a soluble group of finite rank? The answer is affirmative under the additional hypothesis that G/A is locally polycyclic (D. I. Zaitsev, Algebra and Logic, 19, no. 2 (1980), 94–105).
D. I. Zaitsev
answer: The answer is affirmative under the additional hypothesis that G/A is locally polycyclic (D. I. Zaitsev, Algebra and Logic, 19, no. 2 (1980), 94–105).
